DataElement.preferredName: Adapted WLQ Plan to Take Leave of Absence From Work Over Next Year Because of Caregiving Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's response that indicates whether they plan to take a leave of absence from work over the next year because of their caregiving.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Change WLQ Plan to Take Leave of Absence From Work Over Next Year Because of Caregiving
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character._A standardized rating scale originally developed by Lerner et al in 1998. This instrument is used to measure the degree to which health problems interfere with specific aspects of job performance and health-related productivity loss in employed individuals._A question about whether an individual plans to take a leave of absence from work over the next year because of their caregiving.
